pages.title: Levitate
pages.text: $(bold)COST: Lv1 = $(spell) + $(#af4e9f)Shulker Shell$() $(br)$(bold)Lv2 = $(spell) + $(#075eba)Elytra$() $(br2)$(bold)MAX LEVEL:$() $(#green)2$() $(br2)$(bold)XP COST:$() 【 Lv1 = $(#green)12$() 】•【 Lv2 = $(#green)24$() 】 $(br2)$(italic)''One of the harder spells to craft but extremely useful for clearing away annoying and pesky ennemies!''$()

When casting $(#53a2a3)$(bold)Levitate$(), a light projectile is cast from your scroll. $(br2)When $(#53a2a3)$(bold)Levitate$() hits an entity, it will grant them the Potion Effect $(bold)Levitation$(). $(br2)The higher level the spell is, the longer the status effect will be granted for. $(br2)$(bold)Tip: $(italic)The scroll is a one-time use.$()
